meta.title: WATEN | Global Streetwear
meta.description: WATEN — Premium streetwear built for global dominance. Limited drops. Strong brand identity.

invest.heading: Invest in WATEN
invest.body: WATEN is positioned for aggressive expansion across Tunisia and international markets. High-margin model. Limited drops. Strong brand identity. Seeking strategic investors to scale retail and global distribution.

footer.tagline: Premium streetwear. Limited drops. Global reach.
